backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing authorization, user profiles, mastering project management, and blob storage integration.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old project records to the new format by adding nullable blob fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to files, components, and test IDs for deployment and smoke‑test verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten summaries for many frontend files covering styles, pages, hooks, audio engine logic, and i18n.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_PRODUCTION.md: Guide describing prerequisites and steps to deploy the frontend to production.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that loads the React application entrypoint.
frontend/PRODUCTION_SMOKE_TEST.md: Post‑deployment smoke test checklist validating core app functionality including auth, upload, presets, and playback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app configuring routing, theming, i18n, header/footer layout, authentication UI, and studio navigation.
frontend/src/audio/engine.ts: Implements a Web Audio–based mastering engine with EQ, saturation, compression, limiting, stereo width, and reference/compare routing.
frontend/src/audio/metadata.ts: Provides audio file validation and metadata extraction using the Web Audio API.
frontend/src/audio/presets.ts: Defines the MasteringPreset interface and a collection of built‑in mastering presets with EQ, compression, limiter, saturation, and stereo width settings.
frontend/src/audio/wavExport.ts: Renders mastered audio to a WAV Blob using an OfflineAudioContext and preset‑based processing chain.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save a display name.
frontend/src/components/HelpFAQ.tsx: Renders a localized FAQ section with questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/i18n/LanguageSwi: Provides a dropdown UI for switching application languages.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Renders a list of projects with delete actions, date formatting, and preset name localization. Uses i18n, project hooks, and shows loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallEntryP: Displays a PWA install button when installation is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes. Loads secret admin token and initializes access control.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handling, and persists identity via AuthClient. Exposes context with status flags and identity management hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useProjects.ts: Supplies React Query hooks to fetch, create, and delete mastering projects using the backend actor. Automatically invalidates the projects query on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallVisibili: Tracks PWA install eligibility and state, handling beforeinstallprompt events and triggering installation prompts. Stores installation status in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and saves the caller's user profile through the backend actor using React Query. Invalidates the profile query on updates and handles loading state with actor readiness.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides language state, locale, and translations with persistence in localStorage. Wraps children with an i18n context for accessing t and language setters.
frontend/src/i18n/presets.ts: Defines localized names and descriptions for mastering presets in Portuguese and English. Exports a lookup used to display preset metadata.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines the full translation schema and language-specific text for UI sections in Portuguese and English. Exports the translations mapping keyed by language.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Convenience hook that returns the i18n context exposed by I18nProvider.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark OKLCH color variables plus utility classes like waveform-gradient and glass-effect.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Implements the public landing page with hero, workflow sections, and authentication-aware Get Started button.
frontend/src/pages/MasteringStudio.tsx: Implements the authenticated mastering UI, handling audio loading, metadata, presets, playback, exporting, and project CRUD.
frontend/src/utils/audioErrors.ts: Provides normalized error messages and dev-mode logging helpers for audio-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and OKLCH-driven theme tokens.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, approved version, features, and deployment context.
